summary: AN ORDINANCE amending the 2007 Adopted Budget, including the 2007- 2012 Capital Improvement Program (CIP) and the Position List; changing appropriations to various departments and from various funds in the Budget; revising allocations in the 2007-2012 CIP for certain projects; creating, abrogating and modifying positions; and lifting provisos for the Department of Parks and Recreation.
note: Second Fourth Quarter 2007 Supplemental Budget Ordinance
